name: 瓦内萨·沃尔什
name_full: 瓦内萨·沃尔什 Vanessa Walsh
introduction: Whilst working on a commercial tuna-fishing vessel a hundred miles off the Oregon coast, Vanessa realized she wanted to follow a life as an actor.She recently wrapped on Amazon's Wilderness (2023), coming 2023.Her television work includes Freeform's Motherland: Fort Salem (2020); Frida Novikov on The Flash (2014); and the titular "best friend" alongside Mary Grill in Best Friend's Betrayal (2019). She was part of the stellar ensemble in the short film A.T.A.C.K. (2022) directed by Nathalie Boltt, which she also produced with her husband, Nelson Leis.Vanessa trained in London at The Globe Theatre and with The London International School of Performing Arts. She graduated from The University of Minnesota/Guthrie Theatre BFA Actor Training Program.Vanessa and Nelson welcomed their daughter, Stella, in July 2021.
